wikipedia_page.main: Laura Marie Rafferty (born 29 April 1996) is a Northern Irish footballer who plays as a defender for Southampton in the FA Women's National League South and the Northern Ireland national team. She previously played for Chelsea L.F.C..

response: * Laura Rafferty, footballer for Brighton & Hove Albion.

Legg emerged from Chelsea's Centre of Excellence to join the first team for the 2016 FA WSL season. In July 2016 Chelsea sent Legg and teammate Laura Rafferty on loan to Oxford United. Legg and Rafferty both signed for Brighton & Hove Albion ahead of the FA WSL Spring Series.
